page.title: 08HOME LIFE-CHILD-KINGSBARNS
page.content: {1MORNING}- I GOT UP AT 8 O'CLOCK ON SATURDAY, WASHED, CLEANED MY TEETH, AND HAD BREAKFAST. I THEN WATCHED T.V. FOR A WHILE, AFTER WHICH I WENT TO VISIT MY GRAN. {AFTERNOON} - I CAME HOME FROM GRAN'S, WASHED MY HANDS AND HAD DINNER AT 12.1O HRS. I THEN HAD TO WASH AND CHANGE IN ORDER TO GO ON THE SUNDAY SCHOOL TRIP TO CRAIGTOUN PARK, ST. ANDREWS. THERE WERE RACES AND GAMES, TEA AND CAKES, AND ALSO GOING ON THE ROWING BOATS. {EVENING} - I RETURNED FROM CRAIGTOUN AT 18.3O HRS. I THEN WATCHED T.V. UNTIL 21.OO HRS., WASHED AND PUT ON MY PYJAMAS. {NIGHT} - I WENT TO BED AND SLEPT SOUNDLY.
